Military Department 
No 4906
Extract from the Minutes of Consultation 
12th December 1843.
Read the following Extract 
Public Department 
No 1298
Extract from the Minutes of Consultation 
Read the following letter 
from the Honorable Company’s Astronomer 
From T. G. Taylor Esqre 
Honorable Company’s Astronomer 
To The Chief Secretary to Government 
Fort St George 
Sir,
I have the honor to state
